meanings.sent1: The children rolled down the monticule in the park.
meanings.sent2: The ants built their nest at the top of the monticule.
meanings.sent3: The tiny monticule of sand looked like a miniature mountain.
meanings.sent4: The monticule of books on her desk seemed to grow taller every day.
meanings.sent5: The lone tree stood proudly on the monticule, overlooking the valley.

meanings.sent1: The farm had a small monticule where the crops grew best.
meanings.sent2: The monticule provided a perfect vantage point for bird watching.
meanings.sent3: The monticule of pillows on the bed made it hard to find space to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The monticule of rocks in the garden resembled a miniature mountain range.
meanings.sent5: The monticule in the distance marked the boundary of the old estate.
